com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs4Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs4Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl

    public class Hs4Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl
    Public API for the HS4 bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS4 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS4 device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(int) to discovery a new HS4 device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS4 device.
